data.eml:eml: On a second species of Envia Ott & Höfer, 2003 (Araneae, Microstigmatidae), with notes on the sympatric type species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Miglio, Laura Tavares, Bonaldo, Alexandre Bragio (2011): On a second species of Envia Ott & Höfer, 2003 (Araneae, Microstigmatidae), with notes on the sympatric type species. Zootaxa 2971: 33-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278245
